item.title: How the Threat of Trump’s Highest Tariff Derailed an African Nation
item.description: The president backed off his call for a 50 percent tariff on Lesotho, imposing 15 percent instead. But in a country where most people live hand-to-mou...

item.title: Putin Blames Frustration Over Ukraine Talks on ‘Inflated Expectations’
item.description: The Russian president didn’t directly respond to President Trump’s ultimatum that Moscow halt its offensive by the end of next week or face financial ...

item.title: SpaceX, NASA Launch Astronauts to Space Station as Clouds Stay Just Far Enough Away
item.description: After a scrubbed launch on Thursday, four astronauts lifted off from Florida and will dock at the International Space Station on Saturday.

item.title: Trump Turns to Untested Tariffs to Reorder Global Trade
item.description: President Trump has long wanted to rework world trade. The tariffs set to go into effect next week will carry out that plan.
